title: Icon?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Where do you get this icon? I saw one of my friends with it and I really really want it.

replies.body: As Zombiemaster mentioned, just take the quiz, but make sure you're logged on to your account.  The icon will not arrive right away, and will take a few days for most players.  Hang tight until it's unlocked!
I did the quiz but did not receive the icon
It can take a few days for the icon to be added to your account.

All you need to do is complete the Star Guardian Quiz here.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/star-guardian-2016#FPquiz
